meanings.def: one of a pair of long narrow pieces of wood, metal or plastic that you attach to boots so that you can move smoothly over snow
examples: All skis should be waxed on a frequent basis.
on skis The children go to school on skis.

meanings.def: either of the pair of long flat boards on which a person stands in order to waterski
connected with the sport of skiing
examples: She was on a ski trip in Colorado.

meanings.def: to move over snow on skis, especially as a sport
examples: Our children want to learn to ski.
ski + adv./prep. How well do you ski?
We skied down the slope one by one.
We ski in the winter and sail in the summer.

meanings.def: to spend time skiing for pleasure
examples: We went skiing in France in March.
